plot: Nikki Grahame, the pint-sized diva from Big Brother 7, is given the chance to test her mettle in a variety of occupations over a six-week period.
plot_en: Nikki Grahame, the pint-sized diva from Big Brother 7, is given the chance to test her mettle in a variety of occupations over a six-week period.
plot_es: Nikki Grahame, the pint-sized diva from Big Brother 7, is given the chance to test her mettle in a variety of occupations over a six-week period.
title: Princess Nikki
